# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


SUBJECT: Departure of Secstate from La Paz, Bolivia

Secstate aircraft departed "El Alto" International Airport of La Paz, Bolivia at 1740 hrs, October 23, 1979, en route Wash., D.C.

Boeker
